name: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is:A daily, visibly age-defying eye cream that diminishes the appearance of wrinkles and dark circles..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dark Circles.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Peptides: Support collagen to visibly reduce wrinkles around eyes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of formaldehydes, phthalates, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan..What Else You Need to Know:Smooth and visibly brighten your eye area with this bestselling, visibly age-defying cream. It targets five types of eye-area wrinkles (crowu2019s feet and frown lines, as well as wrinkles at inner-eye corners, under-eyes, and around eyes) while also prioritizing dark circles and eye-bag puffiness..Clinical Results:In a consumer test with 110 women, after 7 days:
ingredients: -Peptides: Support collagen to visibly reduce wrinkles around eyes..-Squalane: Hydrates and protects skinu2019s moisture barrier while visibly smoothing fine lines..-Ginseng Extract: Visibly brightens eyes and reduces dark circles...Water (Aqua/Eau), Hydrogenated Polydecene, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum/Huile Minerale), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Paraffin, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline), Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Squalane, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Glutamate, Sodium PCA, Dipropylene Glycol, Carnosine, Beeswax (Cera Alba/Cire D'Abeille), Polyethylene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Caffeine, PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Sapindus Mukorossi Peel Extract, Uncaria Gambir Extract, Angelica Keiskei Leaf/Stem Extract, Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract, Sanguisorba Officinalis Root Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract, Eucheuma Serra/Grateloupia Sparsa/Saccharina Angustata/Ulva Linza/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Sodium Lactate, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Rhizome Extract, Saccharina Angustata/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Alcohol, Trisodium EDTA, Tocopherol, Sodium Metabisulfite, PPG-3 Dipivalate, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, BHT, Alpinia Speciosa Leaf Extract, Carbomer, Polysorbate 20, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Ethylparaben, Methylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine..-Dot a rice grain-size amount around eye area, from orbital bone to brow bone..-Use ring finger to gently massage cream in a circle, starting under eye and around lid/brow bone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This thick and moisturizing eye cream has bold claims and a high pricetag to match- for around $60, Sheiseido boasts that this cream visibly reduces wrinkles and dark undereye circles in a little as a week. While I had my experience using this cream was largely pleasant, I did not notice any significant changes in my eye area during my 4+ weeks of use. Although the cream is very thick, it absorbs well and lays beautifully under concealer with no pilling or smudging of eye makeup layered on top. Any wrinkle reduction was only due to extra hydration that plumped up the skin around my eyes a little.   I do however, want to call attention to the fact that, while being marketed as a luxury product, this eye cream is composed primarily of mineral oil and paraffin along with a host of other potentially harmful chemicals, including parabens. The price tag on this item is certainly not justified given the cheap ingredients used as its chief components.   Although this eye cream performed just fine and felt very rich, I recommend looking for an anti-aging eye cream that uses cleaner ingredients and more advanced technology, rather than relying on a petroleum-based product for your delicate and absorbent eye area.

reviews.review_title: Pretty good, but not ground breaking.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I'm getting older, I'm becoming more aware/careful of what I put on my skin. I used to assume that luxury product companies know what they're doing/lead the way for top tier skin care without including any ingredients that could be harmful, but I'm learning they have plenty of ingredients that can cause issues with my skin. One in particular, Microcrystalline wax, from my understanding is a cause for Milia, which is an issue that I have had to address before with my dermatologist, so I try hard to not purchase items that will cause more so I won't have to be treated for it again. That, for me, is kind of a big knock against it since my skin is prone to Milia. It makes me gun shy to use the product.   Pros: Nice, heavy glass jar that feels like good quality and plastic spatula included for application. Cream was nice and light, didn't feel sticky or heavy/greasy which I appreciate because I don't like how that feels on my hands, let alone my face, especially because my face tends to run oily anyway. I can't speak to under eye/bags puffiness because I don't really have that issue, but I DID notice a subtle difference in terms of fine lines/wrinkles. I'm not sure if it was just filling them in or actually plumping my skin to make it appear more youthful, but I'm happy with the results either way! I will say, though, that I preferred using it out of the shower or on no make-up days, as I didn't like how my makeup applied with it on underneath. Overall, I would say it's a good product, but I wouldn't make it one of my go-to's.

reviews.review_title: Noticeable difference after a week of use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: received the shiseido eye cream in exchange for my honest review through influenster. I have been using this for well over a month now and I have really been able to see a noticeable difference in fine lines and crows feet. It has minimized those laugh lines in the corner of the eyes when I smile. I do feel like after using this i can observe that the skin under my eyes is not quite as thin, it seems to improve the elasticity of the skin directly underneath the eye. Although I have never had much of a problem with under eye bags or dark skin, it does seem to improve the look of the skin when I put it on in the morning. I notice some definite decrease in puffiness. The product itself comes in an elegant little pot with a gold lid. It is much thicker than a lot of eye creams I have used in the past. It has a lovely, clean smell to it that is not overpowering in the least, nor does it stick around long, which is nice for me because I suffer from migraines, and too much of a perfumey fragrance can really be a trigger. As I mentioned previously, the consistency of this cream is rather thick and creamy and I discovered that it will leave a bit of an oily residue on the skin that lasts for about an hour or so after application. It does not seem to affect the staying power of any makeup you might put on after using the product. The oily residue I noticed also has not caused any problems with acne or skin discomfort of any sort. I have experienced nothing but positive effects from using this product. I would highly rate it as one of the best eye creams I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can honestly say that I have never tried any eye cream as hydrating as the Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream. It was also a long lasting hydration that wouldn't go away for hours. I also love the way it keeps my under eyes and lids smooth when I apply makeup. I have been using it more at night and have noticed a huge difference in the morning when I am doing my morning routine. It has helped my eye area stay hydrated and that can also help prevent wrinkles. I suffer from extremely dry skin and not much works when it comes to hydrating and moisturizing my skin. So this has been really helpful in my skin care routine and I would love it if they had a moisturizer for face and body with this same hydrating technique I would definitely buy it. I would 100 percent recommend this eye cream to anyone who has extremely dry skin and under eyes like me I think they would love it as much as I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my mid-40s, and my concerns around my eyes are hydration, lightening, and smoothing. I don't have noticeable wrinkles under my eyes, but I am starting to see some crow's feet when I smile. I have a small dark spot under my right eye that usually responds well to vitamin C.   I've used this during my a.m. and p.m. skincare routine as my last step. I dab a tiny amount with my ring finger and gently pat under my undereye and around the eyebone. It left my undereye skin feeling hydrated and soft from the first use. After using it regularly for several weeks, I see that my skin looks smoother and more supple overall. I haven't seen any lightening of the dark spot, but I understand this product isn't targeting that issue.   The eye cream comes in a heavy, round glass container with a twist-off lid that gives a sense of luxury to it. It's a beige-colored cream with a medium lotion consistency that absorbs quickly in the skin without any greasy residue.   It initially has a strong perfume scent but becomes less noticeable over time. However, my preference would be unscented. The scent makes me think of a body lotion; there's no reason to have it in a cream so close to the eye. Overall, the cream is effective, and I recommend it to others looking for these features. However, I would need something with lightening ingredients for my particular needs.

After using this product for several weeks, I can confidently say that it is exceptional. It effectively hydrates and provides anti-aging benefits. I noticed a reduction in wrinkles and a decrease in the visibility of my dark circles. The formula contains Peptides, Ginseng Extract, Caffeine, and Japanese botanicals, which professionally address various concerns in the eye area. Based on my positive experience, I would strongly consider purchasing this product in the future.

reviews.review_text: The jar was a lot bigger than I expected it to be and a little goes a very long way - thatu2019s saying a lot from me since my under eyes are typically pretty dry. I will say that Iu2019m not sure yet if it has helped with wrinkles yet, but it does effectively hydrate the under eye area and provides a nice canvas for makeup. The scent is a pleasant one; however, itu2019s very fragranced which is something Iu2019d prefer to avoid in skincare especially in the delicate eye area.  Overall, Iu2019m still enjoying using this and looking forward to keep using this jar for now. NOTE: I probably wouldnu2019t recommend if youu2019re looking for something truly lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shiseido Benefiance Winkle Smoothing Eye Cream is a rich, soothing, moisturizing creme. It has a creamy consistency and absorbs without any greasiness. It has a beautiful scent and is non-irritating to my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the thickness of this product. It feels great going on but does dry well and doesnu2019t feel crazy thick after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Noticed that the product instructions call for using this product as the last step of your skincare routine.  I chose to use this product in my daytime routine only. I liked that a little went a long way, I experimented with different amounts to find what worked for me. After using it for only one week I started noticing results - my dark circles weren't as pronounced and the skin under my eyes appeared more supple and wasn't as crepey. I've always had dark circles and have tried other products that haven't worked as well or as quick. Although this product left a slick feel and took about a minute to really soak in, it worked well under my concealer and didn't crease or melt away. I'm looking forward to the result after I finish the jar! I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really have enjoyed this eye cream. Many creams Iu2019ve used in the past leave my skin around my eyes feeling greasy and gross. This has be a game changer. I have subtle wrinkles under my eyes and this cream has helped a lot with the appearance of those wrinkles. And the scent is very nice too. Iu2019m sold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Influenster sent me this in exchange for my honest review. I have used it religiously for 3 weeks as my night eye cream. It has a very slight scent. It is not strong or over powering like some other luxury brands. It is so slight that It doesnu2019t bother my skin or my nose. I hate feeling like my skin care has perfume in and this doesnu2019t feel like heavy perfume. It has kept my eyes moisturized and plump. I like that it comes with a small scoop so that you donu2019t have to dip your finger in the jar. I will continue to use and purchase this in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shiseido eye cream comes in a beautiful, heavy duty jar that has a beautiful iridescent sheen . I have been using it a couple of weeks and have seen a  slight improvement to the little lines under my eyes. Generally like using a product for a full month before expecting the full result. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a good eye cream!   *Influenster sent me this complimentary in exchange for my honest review. All opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! It smells great and works almost overnight to get less under eye puffiness and bags. I canu2019t recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this eyecream at the tail of the summer and start of the fall. At first found it very greasy but then I realized I just need a little tiny dot of it, and it actually is soooo moisturizing! And it doesn't fight my under eye concealer either which I am happy about. I didn't give it a five because for an eyecream it is a little too oily, but all in all it is an awesome luxury product that works perfect on colder drier days like the coldest part of the fall and all winter season.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

I noticed that some of my fine lines were not as noticeable and my eyes did appear more hydrated. I saw a slight difference in my u201c11u201d lines between my brows. The cream itself has a lovely scent as well. Only thing I would change is the wand and the jar lid. Thereu2019s no way of keeping the wand attached to the jar.

reviews.review_title: Really wanted it to work- not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me. It does what it says, but my eyes became too sensitive to use it in the morning. I used it at night for 2 weeks and saw a great response with hydration and dark circles, but started getting puffy which is not what usually happens with my go-to eye creams. There is some fragrance in there which is likely what did me in (normally not sensitive to fragrance, but itu2019s trial and error with some products. The formula caked my concealer when I initially used it during the day so that was a no for me. However, beautiful packaging and luxurious feel to the cream if youu2019re on the dry side. Really wish this worked better for me to use long term- it seems to be accurate in their claims if you can tolerate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells so good. Itu2019s perfect with the winter when you get super dry. Itu2019s very hydrating for your under eyes definitely a bit pricy but itu2019s a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream by Shiseido is a very rich peptide and squalene rich cream that spreads under the eyes and around the orbital bone like butter and addresses dryness, crows feet, fine lines, wrinkles, and puffiness. Ginseng extract and a blend of Japanese botanicals help brighten under eyes and reduce dark circles. As a 36 year old with a primary concern of aging around my eyes, this cream has proven itself time and time again as the perfect eye cream to help combat all of those issues and keep my eye area looking youthful. I highly recommend this eye cream, especially if you are self conscious about those crows feet or tired-looking eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eye cream! I use it as nightly ritual and put on my fourth finger, tap around the eye and spread it in a sweeping motion.  - the most obvious when I first open the lid is the scent. I like the scent, smells floral and luxurious  - In the short span of testing, puffiness seems lesser, lines is smoother albeit not gone and a little brighter.   Will continue to try it to see the long term effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a lot of puffiness under my eye and after 3 weeks of use, I noticed a significant difference in the appearance of the puffiness and lines around the eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: didn't know what to expect from this eye cream.  I haven't used Shiseido in forever and I have so many reactions to products. Color me surprised when I tried it and could actually keep it on without it breaking me out around my eye area, have a migraine, or dry me out even more. It is fragranced but I find it a powdery scent that dissipates once on the skin and isn't overwhelming in the jar. The texture is a thick cream that stays that way, moisturizing yet occlusive. I recommend it at night since I find my mascara and makeup slips off even with light application of said cream. Even though I've only been using it for a few months I can say I've seen some benefits: some of my fine lines have been minimized, dryness has been relieved, and a little texture has been refined. Its definitely not a holy grail since I am not looking for my eye area to look like it did when I was 25 but it helps me to not look so tired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine wrinkles and some creping on my eye lids. I have more pronounced dark circle on my right eye. Overall my eyes appear a bit sunken due to dehydration and insomnia. With cooler weather I tend to get some dry patches. Nothing has really helped.  It does have a strong floral scent at first, but it goes away. I went to the company site to verify how to apply properly, glad I did as I think it helped as it is a more Gua Sha type approach vs tapping the product in.  You do not need a lot of product, otherwise it doesn't absorb quickly and the fragrance may irritate sensitive eyes as a result.  Within a week, the fine crows feet softened and the sunken look diminished. My eyelids appeared smoother. I applied between the eyebrows as directed and the lines there have softened too.  Dark circles are still there, but the left eye (which was less dark) looks lighter. My right eye for awhile seemed darker, but then seemed to have shrunk in size.  It is a very thick cream, again a little goes a long way, so in the summer I could see this being a problem with my combination skin that leans more oily during that season.  It has been 3 weeks and I think my eyes show a big improvement in softness, smoothness, less wrinkles and firmer skin. My hope is with longer use the dark circles will improve.  Tip: the residue on your fingers apply to smile lines, upper lip and/or forehead. This cream helps softened any lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm delighted with the Shiseido Benefiance wrinkle smoothing eye cream. The formulation is absolutely wonderful and applies smoothly without leaving a greasy residue. It absorbs quickly and after only a couple weeks of using it, I noticed the skin around my eyes appeared brighter and tighter. I'd noticed a few crows feet over the past few years and while not gone, they are diminished. The scent is also very pleasant and mild. It has a fresh slightly rose scented smell that is light and refreshing. I'm also a huge fan of packaging and the bottle is classy and beautifully packaged. Overall, I'm a huge fan and would recommend this to anyone looking for a non greasy anti wrinkle formula that actually works. Incentivised review.

I only wear it at night because it never fully absorbs. It would be too oily for me under makeup. If youu2019re looking for something scented (slightly floral/powdery) and super moisturizing, then this is for you. I really canu2019t comment to its effect on wrinkles because I use this for prevention. This product does contain parabens if you are particular about ingredients.

reviews.review_text: *I received this product complimentary for testing purposes from Influenster.* I have been using Sheseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream for a month now, and have been quite happy with it. I have normal to dry skin, and this has been a wonderful fit for me. I have been using it alone to start just to make sure that I haven't had any reactions or breakouts, and it has been great. The consistency is just perfect, not too light or heavy, just a beautiful combo right in between. The cream has a very light natural scent that I love, it is not offensive or strong at all. I have been extremely pleased with the results that I have seen. I have noticed the skin around my eyes feels softer, and definitely appears healthier with a smooth and moisturized appearance. I have included a couple of pictures of my eye before, and after just a few weeks of use. I definitely can see results. The jar itself is lovely, and I also appreciate that it comes with an applicator. I will definitely be repurchasing, this is a now a must have for my routine.

reviews.review_text: This is an incentivized review. I received the product for free in exchange for an honest review.   This product unfortunately doesnu2019t work for me. reviews.review_text: Thanks Shisheido and Influenster for letting me try this product for my honest opinion! The first thing I noticed about this Shisheido Benefiance Eye Cream is how very hydrating it is. The consistency is thicker but not too heavy or greasy and a little bit really goes a long way. My under eye area tends to be dry so this has really improved the elasticity and made my skin look and feel more plump. I havenu2019t noticed any major difference with larger wrinkles but my skins texture is less uneven and feels softer around my eyes. With my under eye puffiness, this seemed to help diminish the appearance after using it for a while as well. The scent is there without being overpowering and I havenu2019t noticed any type of irritation after using this. Overall Iu2019m definitely noticing a more youthful appearance around my eyes these days! I highly recommend using this if youu2019re concerned at all about aging eyes or just want to plump up and tighten your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is decent but I like my Clinique all about eyes cream better than this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for several weeks now and I have noticed such a difference in my fine lines. Itu2019s like my skin instantly tightens when I put it on. It is nice and thick so it keeps you moisturized throughout the day. The only reason I minus one star is because Iu2019ve noticed if I get it too close to my eye, it is quite irritating, I guess itu2019s more user issue not the product, but that is the reason I gave it four instead of five stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how this feels on my skin and that it rubs in well. I have not noticed any noticeable differences or changes but I know it can take time. I do like this brand as well and I was happy to get to try this product complimentary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't have wrinkles however I do have large puffy dark circles around my eyes. This eye cream really helped my dark circles, they're not as dark and puffy as usual. I think this eye cream has a pleasant smell. I think it's a great product but the price is too high for my budget. I received this free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Silk & Sheen - TBD on the Wrinkles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too soon yet to tell if it makes a difference in actually smoothing or preventing any impending wrinkles, but it's like silk going on and has a luscious sheen that makes me feel glamorous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this eye cream for a couple of weeks, I have noticed an improvement in my eye area. I have dry skin but this cream provides enough hydration that I can use it both day and night. It is light and easy to apply. Iu2019d recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Shiseido eye cream is one of the best eye creams on the market. It is very hydrating and plumping. It made my fine lines disappear in a week. I look younger, less tired, and well-rested. It is a little pricy but a little goes a long way. Hands down for this eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this out for 2 weeks and to be honest I didnu2019t see any difference. I did only use it at night though because it was way too greasy to wear during the day.  I donu2019t do full face makeup, so perhaps it would be fine under powder foundation.   It did leave my skin feeling nice when I washed it off in the morning and I really love the light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an eye cream that is nourishing and smells lovely. Texture is creamy. It comes with a little spatula and a little goes a long way. I have been using this for the past few weeks and it definitely keeps my eye area well hydrated. I do not have wrinkles currently though so this is more of a preventative product. Iu2019d recommend this if you need a nice rich eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for two weeks, and here are my thoughts:   -It is very thick. Maybe too much so for my oily skin, but I think it would be great for dry skin.  -A little goes a looong way! Just a tiny dab is all you need. One jar should last a long time.  -It has a light rose scent. I found it very subtle and after 2 weeks I barely notice it.   I use it at night under my eyes and havenu2019t noticed a big difference yet, but my skin does feel hydrated. I received a free product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I have used several eye creams and this one is definitely superior. I love Shiseido all around but this product is by far the crown jewel of their line! It does a wonderful job filling in lines. I see a big difference if I stop using it. It is also quick to dry which is a huge plus for me with both day and nighttime use. In addition to under and around my eyes I use it between my brows and am very happy with the results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish it came with some type of instructions or recommendations for when is best to use. Definitely not for use before eye makeup since it takes a good while to absorb. I didn't notice much change with my wrinkles. Top pictures are first day of using, 4 bottom pictures after 5 days of use. Good overnight moisturizer, not quite sure about the wrinkle smoothing claim.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lots to say about this product! First and foremost, it works...  The product is ultra hydrating, almost a little greasy. For this reason, it does not take a ton of product to do the job. During the day I use strictly under eye but at night I will also cover my eyelid and even rub a little in between my eyebrows.   Price point is not bad considering the small amount needed and the fact that it does actually work!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product works well but not a quickly as they say it does. It also has a fragrance that I find too strong for me especially when I use it in the evening before bed.   I received this product free from influenster in exchange for my honest opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this eye cream! I feel like the price is well worth it for the experience and the product does exactly what it says. It leaves my under eye feeling so plump and hydrated I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product for several weeks, I have come to the conclusion that itu2019s just not for me. It has giving me more texture under my eyes than I already had. As for any improvement with wrinkles it hasnu2019t done anything. For the price point you can get something better than this product lucky this was a complementary product for me to try so I didnu2019t have to waste my own money on this. Otherwise, I would be very upset.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this eye cream. Unlike other creams Iu2019ve tried this one goes on silky smooth with no pull or drag on the delicate skin around the eyes. My only complaint is the fragrance. I prefer a little less in my products but itu2019s certainly not the worst Iu2019ve seen. This jar will last a long time and I appreciate that value. I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange of my review. This product works. Its a bit dense for my taste but a little goes a long way. I will be getting more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this eye cream! The texture is thick and luxurious and really hydrating under the eyes. While it does have a smell itu2019s not too overpowering and doesnu2019t seem to cause any irritation to the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product and I feel like a little bit goes a long way! It sinks in so nice to your skin and doesnt Leave any residue. I would purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the Shiseido serum and face moisturizer and knew I would also fall in love with the eye cream. I'm 49 years old with a few wrinkles but not many. I have noticed lately, more creeping in. Been using the eye cream for a few weeks before I did my review and I noticed my foundation isn't settling in. It smoothed those fine lines I've been noticing lately. Highly recommend this brand, the price is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While its still too early to see a big difference (about three weeks) I am so happy Influenster sent me a sample to try in exchange for my honest review. It feels luxurious and something so special for my skin and I really hope to see a difference with wrinkles and my skin soon. I know this is a trustworthy brand and I have such high hopes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream. Itu2019s smooth and silky and feels really luxurious on. I also absolutely love the spoon it comes with. Itu2019s the perfect size for the amount of product needed. I donu2019t have wrinkles yet but I love this as a wrinkle preventative cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product in return for honest review. The packaging is amazing. It does have a skincare type scent and if you put too much I could see where it could cause issues with those sensitive to scents. First time applying I put a little too much and my eyes were watering from the scent but not bad enough to make me stop using. It was very hydrating to the skin. However, I did not see much difference in my fine line wrinkles. Would use again for the hydration alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for two weeks now so I feel like I had enough time to give a fair review.  This eye cream is good. Itu2019s on the thicker side but spreads out easily, almost like a cream/gel hybrid so you only need a dab under each eye. Since I have oily eyelids and this cream tends to take a while to absorb, I only wore it at night and still felt the hydration under my eyes when I woke up. I canu2019t wear it during the day under my makeup because I feel like it will break my concealer apart and make things move around.  There is a fragrance, which I can do without. Itu2019s not overly scented I just donu2019t like the idea of fragrance being too close to my eyes. The packaging is nice, comes with a little spatula to scoop out the product for hygienic purposes but I personally never use them unless thereu2019s a way to store them like on the lid or something (Tatcha has that packaging), otherwise I just throw it out.  The jar itself seems huge. Since I only use this product at night I feel like itu2019ll last me a very long time.   Incredibly thankful to be given this opportunity to test it out. Will definitely continue using for hydration underneath my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received an incentive product for a review. I tried it for 6 days and feel extremely dry and have a chemical burn feeling. It's definitely not for me. I wouldn't recommend for sensitive skin. I feel disappointed like I went backwards in my skincare and damaged my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this everyday morning and night. So far, my favorite part of using this product is the feeling of luxury it adds to my skin care routine, and the immediate smoothing I notice around my eyes as my skin soaks in this product. It has a pleasant, light scent to this eye cream, the texture is medium heavy a small pea goes a long way.  when compared to others like it, and it feels immediately hydrating without being greasy. I always try new eye creams and I think this far the best I have used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been a great fan of Shiseido brand ever since my mom recommended it to me because she said itu2019s the only skin care brand she saw huge improvement in her skin. I was super excited to try this eye cream it works out wonderfully, I reduces dark eyes circles fast and it brightens out around the eyes and hydrates pretty well, itu2019s working little by little on the wrinkles, but definitely works. It comes in a small glass jar which makes it feel luxurious and it has a very almost like nothing pretty light lotion scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful, heavy eye cream for a dryer eye area.  I really enjoy the product however the smell and the fact that itu2019s thicker bothers me. I would have to worry about milia building up over around my eye area overtime because of how heavy the cream is.  Overall, I would re-purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels great on. Consideringi usually just use my face cream for my eyes lol i am glad this pot will last me a long time! Does it reduce the look of my wrinkles? Cant exactly say yes but i do have 1 eye that occasionally acts up and this did calm it down for lack of better word. My top lid creases were still just as bad, under eye seemed to plump a bit. Would i buy again... depends on price. As i know this will last me a long time a higher price is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this nightly for the past three weeks, and only use it before bed and havenu2019t tried it under makeup yet. So far, my favorite part of using this product is the feeling of luxury it adds to my skin care routine, and the immediate smoothing I notice around my eyes as my skin soaks in this product. I notice a pleasant, light scent to this eye cream, a substantial texture when compared to others like it, and it feels immediately hydrating without being greasy. Iu2019ve never been convinced that eye creams do much more than effectively moisturize, but this one has exceeded my expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for 3 weeks. The elegance of this eye creamu2019s rich, creamy formula, providing intense hydration and smoothness to my under-eyes. The delightful fragrance enhances the overall experience, and it seamlessly complements my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019ve been using this cream for a week and my dark eye bags have lightened, however i cannot test the anti wrinkle promise it does smell very good and has a light feeling on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye cream. It is so.ruch and creamy. It has a light.pleasent scent. Ive been using it.for.3 weeks and i can already tell.a difference in the.fines lines around my eyes. The skin around my. eyes looks beautiful. No puffiness or darkness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really enjoyed this wrinkle smoothing cream! I have noticed a big change in the appearance of my under eyes and just overall skin in those areas. I am really impressed and a little truly goes a long way! I also used it for my elevens and noticed a smoothing aspect and was truly impressed.  *I received this project for free in return of my honest review and opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Brought this after an employee recommended. After applying the product my under eye begin to tingle some, eventually it turned to burning, rinsed the product off and did not apply anything for a few days, now anything that I apply under my eyes that I was using previously is burning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A good hydrating eye cream! Hydration is my main problem when it comes to my skin, so I enjoyed this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is a miracle in a jar! In the winter months my under eyes can get so dry they look worse but this stuff is the solve! Itu2019s amazing! Love using it before bed and seeing how fresh and awake I look in the morning! 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice eye cream in general. I havent noticed a lot of difference though so I dont know how smoothing it really is. But it does seem moisturizing and is at least keeping my under eye area feeling hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple of weeks Iu2019ve noticed that the area around my eyes is more hydrated and softer. Usually around winter time Iu2019ll get dry patches around my eyes but not this winter. This eye cream is very hydrating. Thereu2019s little to no scent . If anything a very faint clean scent that disappears almost instantly. The cream is pretty thick so you do have to be very careful not to over apply if not your eye area will look like a grease ball. You only need a pea size amount for each eye. I wore it under makeup as well and it wore fine. It didnu2019t disturb my makeup. I have not noticed any diminishing of the small fine lines under my eyes but for that I know it takes more or less 6-8 weeks to begin seeing those results. If you already have oily lids this product is not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product in exchange for an honest review, and I absolutely love this cream. I will say I had to look up how to use it, since it wasnu2019t written on the box, but other than that I love it. It smells amazing, it feelu2019s expensive, and itu2019s also got a little bit of a highlight effect too it. Just know a little goes along way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I must say, I like the thickness and the creamy texture. It feels more substantial than some other eye creams I have used. Iu2019m not sure I saw a noticeable difference but it certainly couldnu2019t have hurt compared to not using anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice eye cream. You don't need a whole lot, it lasts a very long time. Texture is pretty rich and thick and absorbs to the skin very nice smoothly. For what its worth, I personally think its a good value for the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster to test/review.   Okay so I gave this product a solid 3 weeks of use before making this post. First off, itu2019s super hydrating which I love. With that being said, it can be slightly on the greasy side so itu2019s perfect as a nighttime before-bed cream. I wouldnu2019t try and use this under makeup. When I wake up in the morning my under eyes are well hydrated and little less tired looking. I will say unfortunately I have not noticed a difference in the fine lines under my eyes but maybe I need to use the product for longer than 3 weeks to really notice a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. This cream is very hydrating, and has a pretty nice feel to it. It made a little bit of difference in how my eyes looked, too. I like to use it only at night because itu2019s actually pretty heavy and greasy, but if you use the recommended amount you canu2019t tell. I love the packaging and Iu2019m curious as to why the top of the lid comes off (?). This will last at least 8 months for me personally. I wore it under makeup once and even then, I had to kinda dab the greasy/oiliness away first. Itu2019s quite expensive and I wouldnu2019t buy it. There are very effective and way cheaper options. But if youu2019re flush with cash and feeling bougie, Iu2019d say go for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression opening the package is that you can tell this is a quality product. The jar is a nice size and feels sturdy and heavy in your hand, and the lid has a unique shape with an interesting translucent top that has a golden shine coming through. Definitely gorgeous and luxurious looking. It also comes with a tiny spoon for sanitary dispensing so you donu2019t have to stick your finger in the jar.  Now onto the product itself. It has a verrrrry subtle fresh scent to it. So subtle, in fact, that I canu2019t actually tell if it is scented or not, but it is a very pleasant smell. The eye cream itself is SO thick and rich. Applying it under and around my eyes felt so smooth, soft, and creamy. I used only a small amount but even that was almost too much. You really only need a tiny amount because of how thick it is. For that reason, I can see this lasting me a very long time, which I really appreciate because you can really get your moneyu2019s worth. After one use it made my eyes feel hydrated and brighter and after continuing to use it I definitely notice my dark circles almost gone completely. I donu2019t have many fine lines around my eye area but I can definitely see it being a good preventative. I also like the range of ingredients which include peptides, squalane, and ginseng extract to cover multiple different concerns. Iu2019ll be using this product till itu2019s very last drop and definitely 10/10 recommend for eye bags, darkness, and wrinkles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first product test from Shiseido, thanks to a incentivised sample courtesy of Influenster. I love this Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream. It is incredibly hydrating and that hydration lasts at least 24 hours. I felt that it instantly helped with the stress wrinkle between my brows. This cream also helps with plumping the fine lines around my eye area. This works so well, I'm looking to see what other Shiseido products I want to try next.

reviews.review_title: too much fragrance,  not worth the price to me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this eye cream but I couldn't.  the fragrance was a bit too heavy for me.  and it did feel greasy on my skin,  which is actually very dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is so luxurious and rich and a little goes a long way. I can definitely notice a difference in my under eyes and their hydration. For the price, itu2019s an amazing deal, because I canu2019t see myself needing a new jar for at least a year! It has very little scent, but it is a pleasant smell overall. The packaging is beautiful and it even came with a little spoon to get the cream out with!  Iu2019m obsessed.

reviews.review_title: Nice smooth texture, no greasy feel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is so silky smooth and creamy. I love the way it feels on my skin and I havenu2019t noticed a greasy feel at all. Iu2019ve been using it for a few weeks now and canu2019t say I notice a huge difference in my eye area. The area under my eyes does appear brighter after using it and could possibly be looking slightly tighter but itu2019s nothing that anybody would notice other than myself. Iu2019m not a huge fan of the smell. It reminds me of a scent that a grandmother would wear. Itu2019s a little too perfumey for me personally. I love the weight of the jar. Itu2019s solid and decently heavy. Appears to be glass. Itu2019s probably a jar that I will end up saving and adding to my craft stash. I did receive this product for free in return for my honest review. But this review is 100% my own honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It made my under eyes glow! It really felt nice and cooling! I felt like a super star with such an amazing product! I loved the feel of it but I donu2019t think it worked great with makeup as itu2019s very glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shiseido Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream really helps nourish the skin around my eyes. I use it morning and night, and my eyes feel and look well-moisturized the entire day. It is a thicker/richer cream, but it's not greasy. It'll suit winter well since my skin gets really dry then.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product arrived in packing that looked expensive but to my surprised was actually pretty affordable. Works good. I applied it daily under my eye and around my crows feet line area. The cream was soft and non greasy. Kept my under eye soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful if you have dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to test from Influenster. It feels super rich and creamy and stays very hydrating feeling on the skin for a long time. If you have oily skin this would probably not be a good fit for you. I did notice my dark circles fading with it. Overall, if you have dry under eyes I think youu2019d be very happy with this and how long the hydration lasts! Definitely worth a try. It also will last you forever because you barely need any at all and it spreads very well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is luxurious and it smells very nice. It left my under eyes feeling so incredibly good and moisturized and was very refreshing. Definitely will recommend this to friends!

reviews.review_title: Meehu2026 does ANY eye cream really work?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

There is a scent but itu2019s not overpowering and goes away. I didnu2019t have too many wrinkles but it helped the ones that I did have. It also helped with my puffiness in the mornings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Influenster I was able to experience fhe luxurious feeling of this product. It feels like a thicker formula than other eye creams I have used. But it also feels creamier.  Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this straight for a month now as I wanted to really see if it did anything and let me tell you itu2019s truly amazing. My fine lines have disappeared, and the skin around my eyes is so hydrated. My under eye area always looked dry and crapey when I did my makeup no matter what I did but not anymore. It has also helped with the puffiness, I would wake up in the morning and my eyelids and under eye area were so puffy and swollen and nothing would help. It has dramatically improved. I will be using this eye cream for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves your eyes refreshed and smooth. I noticed it helped with fine lines in as little as two weeks. Great consistency. Not too greasy and blends well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for review from influenster.  This eye cream was nice. It does have fragrance so if you don't like fragrance you will not like it. I can't attest for the wrinkles because with any product to see those results you would have to be using it consistently for several months.

My under eyes are so much smoother than before, which in turn means my makeup sits better on my face in the areas Iu2019ve used the cream. I will certainly continue to use this as I think it has positive effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Adfer using this product a few days my skin feels very soft. The product has a gentle smell and the packaging feels luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.   This is an excellent eye cream. The product is packaged well and has a nice rose scent - a little perfumey not over powering, and dissipates quickly. reviews.review_text: Influenster shiseido benefiance wrinkle smoothing eye cream review  Disclosure: I received these products for free from Influenster and Shiseido in exchange for my honest review.  Upon unboxing: The packaging is inarguably luxe. The jar is glass, giving it heft and density. The lid has the Shiseido emblem on it. The cream is a yellowish, pale egg-yolk color. Upon glancing at the ingredients, this is likely from iron oxides. The cream is noticeably fragranced.  Upon first use: A little goes a very long way in terms of moisturizing, which is not surprising considering there are waxes in the ingredient list. The texture reminds me of the Kiehlu2019s avocado eye cream, which I like a lot.  Under makeup, but without concealer: Eyeshadow applied slightly patchy on one eye. I only used the elf halo filter and elf hd setting powder in the eye area prior to eyeshadow application since I was in a hurry. Will try to use and set with powder prior to eyeshadow tomorrow.  Under makeup, with concealer: after allowing time to set in between applying eye cream and makeup, set much better and eyeshadow didnu2019t feel as patchy. I used the tarte shape tape concealer and the elf hd setting powder to set the eye area.   After using twice a day for over a week: I have a visible vein under my eye that is far less noticeable than before using the eye cream. This is incredibly impressive given the continuous sleep deprivation Iu2019ve been through as a new mom. I donu2019t truly have major complaints with my eye area (like severe dark circles), so this eye cream for me is primarily for wrinkle prevention. In terms of performance though, I am impressed it could lighten the darkness under my eye by that much! Plus, there are loads of actives and herbals in this cream that make it a skincare powerhouse. The fragrance definitely makes this feel like a luxury pampering skincare product every time I use it, and itu2019s very enjoyable.  Would I buy it: Not right now for myself, given inflation, since this is a splu
